RocketBooster.name: A0E-9 Rocket Booster
RocketBooster.description: The control fins, fuel lines, and propulsion engines engines required for launch are all housed within the A0E-9 Booster system.

general: Can be carried by vehicles that support up to medium sized shippables
I AM THE GOD OF HELLFIRE

RocketBody.name: A0E-9 Rocket Body
RocketBody.description: The body of an A0E-9 stores the fuel and instrumentation required to deliver the warhead over large distances.

general: Can be carried by vehicles that support up to medium sized shippables

RocketWarhead.name: A0E-9 Rocket Warhead
RocketWarhead.description: The body of an A0E-9 Warhead is a devestating explosive, capable of taking out city districts or even entire small towns. It scorches the landscape, making it hard for the enemy to rebuild in the short-term.

general: Can be carried by vehicles that support up to medium sized shippables
